speaker: ARTEMIDORUS
text:
Here
               
              will
               
              I
               
              stand
               
              till
               
              Caesar
               
              pass
               
              along
              ,

speaker: ARTEMIDORUS
text:
And
               
              as
               
              a
               
              suitor
               
              will
               
              I
               
              give
               
              him
               
              this
              .

speaker: ARTEMIDORUS
text:
My
               
              heart
               
              laments
               
              that
               
              virtue
               
              cannot
               
              live

speaker: ARTEMIDORUS
text:
Out
               
              of
               
              the
               
              teeth
               
              of
               
              emulation
              .

speaker: ARTEMIDORUS
text:
If
               
              thou
               
              read
               
              this
              ,
               
              O
               
              Caesar
              ,
               
              thou
               
              mayest
               
              live
              ;

speaker: ARTEMIDORUS
text:
If
               
              not
              ,
               
              the
               
              Fates
               
              with
               
              traitors
               
              do
               
              contrive
              .
